channel.title: How yo Make your own Costum Spell?
channel.description:
I Always wondered How to make a fully Costumized spell??
Like i want a spell that you need 99 magic for, and its in the normal spellbook, and can only be casted with Chaotic staff.
I know you need a spirte for your spellbook, and give it an animations and a emote
but i dont know where i need to write all those stuff :s

item.title: How yo Make your own Costum Spell?
item.dc:creator: @HostDep HostDep
item.description:
@HostDep wrote:

[quote=“DevotionPk, post:1, topic:443928”]I Always wondered How to make a fully Costumized spell??

Like i want a spell that you need 99 magic for, and its in the normal spellbook, and can only be casted with Chaotic staff.

I know you need a spirte for your spellbook, and give it an animations and a emote

but i dont know where i need to write all those stuff :s[/quote]

not that big of a deal…
Just copy an existant spell, change rate & sprite and there you go…

for the chaotic staff, you will need something like

c.useItem ### else { c.sendmessage("you need chaotic staff blablabla"); }
(that's not the code at all, just an idea)

Read full topic
item.source: How yo Make your own Costum Spell?

item.title: How yo Make your own Costum Spell?
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:443928”]I think it’s to much work to even be worth it.
You’d have to know how to create new gfx and whatnot[/quote]

Nah u can take an already made GFX.

Like Iban’s blast emote and gfx.

Read full topic
